title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.5 - Standards for permit modification for institutional control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.5 - Standards for permit modification for institutional control

State Regulations

Upon review and consideration of the application to
modify the permit to authorize institutional control, the department will
modify the permit authorizing institutional control upon a finding that: (a) the land disposal facility has been
closed in conformance with the approved closure plan; (b) the permittee has provided reasonable
assurance that the performance objectives are being met; (c) the permittee has provided reasonable
assurance that the applicable requirements in sections 382.30 through
382.83
of this Title and the
provisions of this Part are met; (d) the institutional control plan meets the
requirements of section
383-9.8
of this Part; (e) the financial assurances meet the
requirements of Subpart 383-6 of this Part; (f) the post-closure monitoring program is
operational and ready for implementation by the custodial agency; (g) any funds and necessary records for
institutional care will be transferred to the disposal site owner; (h) the custodial agency is prepared to
assume responsibility and ensure that institutional requirements found
necessary under section
383-3.7
(d) of this

Part will be met; and
(i) the
applicable requirements of Part 617 of this Title have been met. Notes
